name: Torii Path
description: A first-person views horror game. After being isolated by the undefined event, you have to find the path to the real world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows7 Processor: intel core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GT 440
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows7 or above Processor: intel core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 260
